page.title: 01Summary Of Area.
page.content: Our block lies at the foot of the Cotswold Hills which are to the South- East.It is overlooked from the West by Robinswood Hill which is 198m in height.The city of Gloucester lies three miles to the North.The M5 motor- way divides the block diagonally from the North-East to the South-West.The centre of the block is dominated by the village of Upton St Leonards.To the North-West of the village is a large, sprawling mixed residential area of council and private housing soon to be greatly increased.The remainder of the block to the East and South is covered by farm land.To the South-East of the block is Prinknash Abbey which lies on the escarpment of the Cotswold Hills.
